thread.title: Lt Governor hands over appointment letter to wife of Martyr Hav Abdul Majid
thread.title_full: Lt Governor hands over appointment letter to wife of Martyr Hav Abdul Majid

author: KNS
title: Lt Governor hands over appointment letter to wife of Martyr Hav Abdul Majid
text: J&KLt Governor hands over appointment letter to wife of Martyr Hav Abdul Majid By KNS Posted on Dec 30, 2023 | Updated on Dec 30, 2023 Share Tweet Share JAMMU, DECEMBER 30 (KNS): Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha handed over appointment letter to Mst. Sagera Bi, wife of martyr Havaldar Abdul Majid, at Raj Bhawan today. The family members of the martyr were also present. The Lt Governor paid homage to the martyr Havaldar Abdul Majid who made supreme sacrifice for the nation during an anti-terror operation in Rajouri. He assured every possible assistance and support to the family of the braveheart. Earlier this month, the Lieutenant Governor had visited the family members of the martyr Havaldar Abdul Majid in Ajote, Poonch.(KNS) Related Categories:Politics Share Tweet Share Recommended for you Lt Governor hands over appointment letter to wife of Martyr Hav Abdul Majid Experience the soulful symphony of Kashmir's craftsmanship, Handicrafts & Handloom Exhibition inaugurated at Boulevard 05-days workshop on “USER Enrolment training on NAFIS” culminates at DPL Srinagar
